column3: 2015 memory wall service info photos / videos nadine kelley jones
column6: sc passed away peacefully into the arms of her savior on wednesday
column8: 2015 at memorial medical center in savannah
column9: ga. mrs. jones was born on march 21
column12: the daughter of the late john kelley
column13: sr. and ouida avery kelley. she was retired from dowling bag co. of savannah
column14: ga. she was a faithful member of red dam baptist church. she was a caring and loving person whose heart went out to everyone. mrs. jones was preceded in death by her husband

column18: sc and kenneth kelley (charlotte) of moultrie
column33: ga. she was also the loving grandmother to 10 grandchildren and 12 great-grandchildren. a funeral service will be held at 2:00 p. m.
column38: sc with burial following in the church cemetery. the family will be receiving friends one hour prior to the service at the church.
